desc:
Fixed
- Broken links in questlog
- Typo preventing detection of teleportation gate
- detection of Lab Store inaccessibility
- Some ML spoilers were corrected

New
tracks which sphere is what color if you use the spheres in combat in the hidden city
eliminates incorrect spheres and non-buff-giving spherical items from the dropdown at hidden city altars
marks gremlins that show the tool or that show the no-tool message
a few more links in the questlog
link to discard karma when you're at the gash
configurable reminder list that shows up when you're about to ascend (set through the Optionarium)
